channel.title: Oldschool nintendo
channel.description:
Iv had this bad boy since I was little.. and was just wondering if anyone else had one and what games?
[IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f304/surfdude2012/2011-01-03_23-58-22_625-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f304/surfdude2012/2011-01-03_23-58-33_921-1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Oldschool nintendo
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:18, topic:376818”][quote author=sppt link=topic=472739.msg3459375#msg3459375 date=1294346504]
Protip for anyone having problems with playing games: NEVER blow onto the contacts, that shit only makes it worse due to oxidation.
The best thing to do is, take a q-tip, put some window cleaner on it, and just gently rub it over the contact pins, and make sure to let it dry.

Also, lol Dick Tracy
[/quote]

GET ON MC YOU FAGGOT!

Also sometimes its the connector in the console. It’s not hard to replace if you know how to solder.[/quote]
In case of the NES it’s even simpler. Just get a new connector, remove the old one, shove the new one on. Done.

Read full topic

The best thing to do is, take a q-tip, put some window cleaner on it, and just gently rub it over the contact pins, and make sure to let it dry.

item.title: Oldschool nintendo
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:16, topic:376818”]Protip for anyone having problems with playing games: NEVER blow onto the contacts, that shit only makes it worse due to oxidation.
The best thing to do is, take a q-tip, put some window cleaner on it, and just gently rub it over the contact pins, and make sure to let it dry.

Also, lol Dick Tracy[/quote]

Used a lot of rubbing alcohol for that too.

Also, what’s with all this Dick Tracy hate? It was sweet on the rare occasions it actually worked, I never got to beat it though…

Read full topic

item.title: Oldschool nintendo
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Protip for anyone having problems with playing games: NEVER blow onto the contacts, that shit only makes it worse due to oxidation.
The best thing to do is, take a q-tip, put some window cleaner on it, and just gently rub it over the contact pins, and make sure to let it dry.

Also, lol Dick Tracy

item.title: Oldschool nintendo
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:376818”][quote author=maniown link=topic=472739.msg3459129#msg3459129 date=1294320966]

Blowing into roms is half the fun! Mopar do you have any roms that you don’t use? Very willing to play them.

I hated blowing into them, because half the time you couldn’t get them to play regardless. Dick Tracy was one of my favorite games, but I could only get it to play maybe 10% of the time I tried.

Also, do you mean games I don’t use, because I could send you roms even if I did use them?

Yes please!

I used to have troubles getting my games to start using the normal square Nintendo. I got a second generation one where the games just slide in the top. Works like a charm all the time.
[/quote]

I never knew there was such a thing as a second generation nintendo. They must have been pretty rare, because I’ve never seen one.[/quote]The “toploader” is pretty hard to come by nowadays, and it had a fairly limited release.

Read full topic

item.title: Oldschool nintendo
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:13, topic:376818”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=472739.msg3458739#msg3458739 date=1294276753]

Blowing into roms is half the fun! Mopar do you have any roms that you don’t use? Very willing to play them.

I hated blowing into them, because half the time you couldn’t get them to play regardless. Dick Tracy was one of my favorite games, but I could only get it to play maybe 10% of the time I tried.

Also, do you mean games I don’t use, because I could send you roms even if I did use them?
[/quote]

Yes please!

I used to have troubles getting my games to start using the normal square Nintendo. I got a second generation one where the games just slide in the top. Works like a charm all the time.[/quote]

I never knew there was such a thing as a second generation nintendo. They must have been pretty rare, because I’ve never seen one.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Blowing into roms is half the fun! Mopar do you have any roms that you don’t use? Very willing to play them.
[/quote]

I hated blowing into them, because half the time you couldn’t get them to play regardless. Dick Tracy was one of my favorite games, but I could only get it to play maybe 10% of the time I tried.

Also, do you mean games I don’t use, because I could send you roms even if I did use them? ;)[/quote]

Yes please!

I used to have troubles getting my games to start using the normal square Nintendo. I got a second generation one where the games just slide in the top. Works like a charm all the time.

item.title: Oldschool nintendo
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:3, topic:376818”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=472739.msg3457430#msg3457430 date=1294149997]
I’ve got a good 70-80 games, as well as 2 Famicoms (consoles)
[/quote]

I’d appreciate a picture of the games please. I’m also willing to trade mario 2 and mario 3 for anything you’ve got that looks good. :P[/quote]When i go home i’ll document them all. I have mario 3 already, but i suppose i could use mario 2!

Read full topic

item.title: Oldschool nintendo
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ve got 2, though one I took apart to harvest the controller plugs for an adapter I made for the computer, so only 1 that works. Of course I haven’t actually plugged it in or used it for years, because whenever I want to play a game an emulator is much better (with the original controllers, of course), and you don’t have to blow into roms!

Read full topic
